{{Quote|We're too far from the gates. Fire... their archers... hundreds will die.|Imry Florent to Stannis Baratheon|Blackwater}}
'''Imry Florent''' is a minor character in the [[Season 2|second season]]. He is played by guest star [[Gordon Mahn]] and only appears in "[[Blackwater (episode)|Blackwater]]." Ser Imry Florent is a member of [[House Florent]] and brother of [[Axell Florent]] and Queen [[Selyse Baratheon|Selyse]], the wife of King [[Stannis Baratheon|Stannis I]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Imry Florent, like the rest of House Florent, declares for Stannis after the death of [[Renly Baratheon]]. He's given command of Stannis' fleet as Lord High Captain and leads it blindly into [[Blackwater Rush]]Â instead of sending scouts like Ser [[Davos Seaworth|Davos]] advised. He was killed in the battle when the flagship ''Fury'' is engulfed in wildfire.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Ser Imry Florent is a member of [[House Florent]] of [[Brightwater Keep]], a noble house sworn to [[House Tyrell]] of [[the Reach]]. However, due to Selyse's marriage to Stannis, the Florents have declared for Stannis in the [[War of the Five Kings]].

===[[Season 2]]===
Ser Imry accompanies Stannis aboard the King's flagship, the ''[[Fury]]''. After much of Stannis' fleet is destroyed with [[wildfire]], Stannis orders his forces to disembark. Ser Imry warns Stannis that hundreds will die trying to reach the shore. The King replies that it will actually be thousands, but is the first to climb down to a ferry boat.<ref>"[[Blackwater (episode)|Blackwater]]"</ref>

As the King's flagship was not engulfed in wildfire during the battle, Ser Imry likely survived the ensuing conflict and retreated upon the defeat of Stannis's army.
